alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 28 at 3:58AM AKST until January 28 at 1:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...Until 1 PM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of decreasing temperatures during the overnight hours and increasing winds across the Kuskokwim Delta will result in wind chills at or below minus 40 degrees Fahrenheit for portions of the Kuskokwim Delta. The coldest wind chills are expected across the Kuskokwim Bay coast and along the Kuskokwim River.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
